item.title: Easy CSS grid
item.description: I’ve been working with a lot of forms lately and it required some kind of grid system to make it all lay out nicely. I’ve always been a bit hesitant to immediatly pull in another dependency and decided I was going to solve this one myself. How hard could it be? By using the CSS flex layout, I ended up with just the right amount of flexibility and extensibility while keeping things very small code wise.
